meanings.definition: The state or condition of being fortunate.
meanings.sent1: Her fortunateness brought her many blessings in life.
meanings.sent2: His fortunateness in finding a job quickly surprised everyone.
meanings.sent3: The cat's fortunateness in catching the mouse made the dog jealous.
meanings.sent4: The fortunateness of the sun shining on the wedding day made it even more special.
meanings.sent5: The fortunateness of winning the lottery was beyond his wildest dreams.

meanings.definition: The quality of having good luck or being favored by fortune.
meanings.sent1: The fortunateness of finding a four-leaf clover made her day.
meanings.sent2: His fortunateness in avoiding the traffic saved him from being late.
meanings.sent3: The fortunateness of the rain stopping just in time for the picnic was a relief.
meanings.sent4: Her fortunateness in always picking the winning team amazed her friends.
meanings.sent5: The fortunateness of being born into a loving family is a true gift.
